uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize.separation

Class BasicPureSeparation

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize.separation.BasicPureSeparation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Separation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicImpureSeparation, PlainPureSeparation

    class BasicPureSeparation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Separation
    This class finds pure solutions to separation problems without any other properties.
    Author:
    Uli Schlachter

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicPureSeparation

        protected BasicPureSeparation(RegionUtility utility,
                              java.lang.String[] locationMap)
        Construct a new instance for solving separation problems. This constructor does not do any checks for supported properties. It is the caller's responsibility to check this.
        Parameters:
        utility - The region utility to use.
        locationMap - Mapping that describes the location of each event.

      • BasicPureSeparation

        public BasicPureSeparation(RegionUtility utility,
                           PNProperties properties,
                           java.lang.String[] locationMap)
                    throws UnsupportedPNPropertiesException
        Construct a new instance for solving separation problems.
        Parameters:
        utility - The region utility to use.
        properties - Properties that the calculated region should satisfy.
        locationMap - Mapping that describes the location of each event.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedPNPropertiesException - If the requested properties are not supported.

        Prepare an inequality system for use by this class.

        A new inequality system.

                                        State otherState)
        Calculate a region solving some state separation problem.
        Specified by:
        calculateSeparatingRegion in interface Separation
        Parameters:
        state - The first state of the separation problem
        otherState - The second state of the separation problem
        Returns:
        A region solving the problem or null.

                                        java.lang.String event)

        Specified by:
        calculateSeparatingRegion in interface Separation
        Parameters:

        event - The event of the separation problem

      • requireDistributableNet

        private static InequalitySystem[] requireDistributableNet(RegionUtility utility,
                                                          java.lang.String[] locationMap,
                                                          java.lang.String event)
        Generate the needed inequalities to guarantee that some distribution requirement is obeyed.
        Parameters:
        utility - Utility instance for which a separation problem is being solved.
        locationMap - Mapping describing how events should be distributed to locations.
        event - Optional event that surely consumes tokens from this region, or null.
        Returns:
        The needed inequalities

      • findRegionFromSystem

        protected Region findRegionFromSystem(InequalitySystem system,
                                      java.util.List<Region> basis,
                                      java.lang.String event)
        Get a region by solving an inequality system.
        Parameters:
        system - The inequality system to solve. Variables must be weights of the entries of the basis.
        basis - The region basis in which the solution of the system should be interpreted.
        event - Optional event that surely consumes tokens from this region, or null.
        Returns:
        A pure region from a solution of the system or null if the system was unsolvable.
